items.title: DOJ Drops Challenge to Amex GBT's Acquisition of CWT
items.description: DOJ Drops Challenge to Amex GBT's Acquisition of CWT

items.title: Mastercard Q2 Earnings Incoming: Hold the Card or Fold the Hand?
items.description: MA eyes a Q2 earnings beat with strong cross-border volumes and rising demand for services, despite higher costs.

items.title: JPMorgan nears deal to take over Apple's credit card program, WSJ reports
items.description: Talks between the largest U.S. bank and the tech giant began last year, as Goldman sought to unwind a partnership that had once been a cornerstone of its consumer banking strategy.  JPMorgan and Goldman declined to comment on the WSJ report, while Apple did not immediately respond to a Reuters request for comment.
